Trump is absolutely dumb enough to believe every QAnon conspiracy theory out there.

author: trai_dep
comment:
>**Funding for controversial review of state‚Äôs vote count in 2020 election can be traced to former president‚Äôs PAC**  
>  
>One of the enduring mysteries surrounding the chaotic attempts to overturn Donald Trump‚Äôs defeat in the 2020 presidential battle has been solved: who made a secret $1m donation to the controversial election ‚Äúaudit‚Äù in Arizona?  
>  
>The identity of one of the largest benefactors behind the discredited review of Arizona‚Äôs vote count has been shrouded in secrecy. Now the Guardian can reveal that the person who partially bankrolled the failed attempt to prove that the election was stolen from Trump was ‚Ä¶ Trump.  
>  
>An analysis by the watchdog group [Documented](https://documented.net) has traced funding for the Arizona audit back to Trump‚Äôs Save America PAC. The group tracked the cash as it passed from Trump‚Äôs fund through an allied conservative group, and from there to a shell company which in turn handed the money to contractors and individuals involved in the Arizona audit.  
>  
>Cyber Ninjas, the Florida-based company that led the Arizona audit, disclosed in 2021 that $5.7m of its budget came from several far-right groups invested in the ‚Äústop the steal‚Äù campaign to overturn Joe Biden‚Äôs presidential victory. It was later divulged that a further $1m had supported the audit from an account controlled by Cleta Mitchell, a Republican election lawyer who advised Trump as he plotted to subvert the 2020 election.  
>  
>But who gave the $1m to Mitchell? In September 2021, as Cyber Ninjas was preparing to deliver its findings, the New York Times reported that unnamed ‚Äúofficials‚Äù had denied that Trump had played any part in securing the funds.  
>  
>Republican leaders of the Arizona senate who asked Cyber Ninjas to carry out the audit also publicly denied that Trump was involved, saying ‚Äúthis absolutely has nothing to do with Trump‚Äù.

If Conservatives ever stopped lying, their lips would never move again.
